article_node.title: 5 Can't-Miss Labor Day Weekend Tech Deals: MacBooks, Monitors, TVs, and More
article_node.summary: The Labor Day Weekend tech deals offer discounts on products that have been well reviewed by PCMag's product experts. Highlights include the 2023 MacBook Pro for its unmatched performance for creative apps, a 30% discount on the lowest price on this model. The gaming monitor for the same price is an "Excellent" rating, with reviewer Zackery Cuevas praising its fast refresh rate, connectivity options, and a swiveling stand. The Blink Outdoor 4 camera with dual-LED lights features up to two years of battery life and features all the features you need in an exterior camera, including two-way audio. Hisense's mid-budget sets deliver value for the money with a 40% price cut. Dyson has expanded its suction-focused product line into hair stylers, air purifiers, and headphones.
